text: Piao Wenyao (; ; born April 25, 1988) is a Chinese Go player. He has Korean ethnicity. He lives in Harbin, Heilongjiang. == Biography == Piao became a professional player when he was 11 in 1999. He was promoted to 3 dan in 2001. He is now 9 dan. Piao won the 15th LG Cup. In the 15th LG cup, he beat Kong Jie with a score of 2-0. ==Promotion record== == Titles and runners-up == Domestic Title Wins Runners-up Mingren 1 (2008) Ahan Tongshan Cup 1 (2009) Xinan Wang 1 (2010) CCTV Cup 1 (2007) National Go Individual 1 (2010) Total 2 3 International Title Wins Runners-up LG Cup 1 (2011) World Oza 1 (2008) Total 1 1 Total: 3 titles, 4 runners-up. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:Sportspeople from Harbin Category:Go players
title: Piao Wenyao
